name: sim
description: sim - If learner doesn't work copy ./core/actions/sim.js to ./node_modules/zenbrain/core/actions/sim.json and ./core/commands/sim.js to ./node_modules/zenbrain/core/commands/sim.json

options.name: verbose
options.description: full console output of the simulation

options.name: start
options.description: start time of the learning simulations

options.name: end
options.description: end time of the learning simulations

options.name: learning
options.description: used by learner, but you can also use this to simulate with learned params instead of default

options.name: rsi_periods
options.description: RSI Periods for the learning simulations (default = 26)

options.name: rsi_period
options.description: RSI Period for the learning simulations (default  = '5m')

options.name: rsi_up
options.description: top RSI value for the learning simulations (default = 65)

options.name: rsi_down
options.description: bottom RSI value for the learning simulations (default = 28)

options.name: min_reversal_wait
options.description: start time of the learning simulations (default = 86400000 * 0.75)

options.name: min_performance
options.description: lowest acceptable performance value for the learning simulations (default = -0.015)
